alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 10:04AM CDT until April 01 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 66.0 feet, Farm and pasturelands in the area will flood and cattle should be moved to higher ground. At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 65.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to rise, rising above flood stage by this afternoon. The river is forecast to crest at a stage of 71.9 feet Thursday evening then begin to fall, falling below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
